feature1.explanation: Both texts use quotation marks and hyphens appropriately.

overall.explanation: Considering the commonalities in punctuation style, lexical and grammatical features, sentence structure, discourse features, and absence of spelling errors, the likelihood of the two texts being written by the same author is high.
